text: Guatteria geminiflora is a species of plant in the Annonaceae family. It is endemic to Peru. ==References== * World Conservation Monitoring Centre 1998. Guatteria geminiflora. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. title: Guatteria geminiflora
